name: EMA house - The Zurich All Suite Hotel

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed June 2009, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: My husband and I stayed for 3 nights in Ema House in Zurich. I booked it on the hotel website after reading riviews on tripadvisor.com. am I GLAD that I did so!! The hotel is fantabulous, the staff -very friendly and helpful and the studio apartments are beautiful with a cute sitout.They include breakfast and city pass in the room rate. I just fell in love with this place and would recommend this to all. It is true value for money. I just wish they had branches in Paris and other European cities. Hotels in downtown Paris are horrible and could do with a hotel like this
reviews.title: fabulous hotel

likes.liked: — the room layout and size, facilities and staff

reviews.text: Good location close to the central railway station and Bahnhopfstrasse, say 5-8mins walk. The suites make your stay comfortable because you have much more than a bed in the rooms. The staff is very friendly and try to do their best to help you. The services are very efficient and the breakfast was typical but convenient since served in your room. The toilets, bed, lift corridors are all well maintained and clean. Overall we enjoyed our stay (tho' short) and would love to go back to this place next time we're in Zurich!
reviews.title: One of the BEST VALUE stays I've had in recent times, great service too!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2009, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Fantastic stay! We a had a spacious room on the top floor. Room had a balcony, skylights, table, desk, separate bedroom, video library, and fresh (free) fruit waiting when we got there. Staff was very friendly, yet privacy was respected. Very nice stay!
reviews.title: Excellent!

reviews.text: I've never written a hotel review before, but our stay at EMA House in May was amazing. After staying in a tiny hotel room in Paris, we were blown away by the rooms at EMA House. It's an all-suite hotel, and our family group used 3 different suites, one nicer and bigger than the next. They were spotless, each had a huge bathroom with both shower & tub fitted with shower, heated towel rack, multiple storage cabinets. You get the picture.
reviews.title: Couldn't be Better

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed April 2009, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Breakfast was delivered each morning at the time requested, and consisted of a whole trolley of food -- baskets of mixed rolls, plates of cheese & ham & sausages, muesli and corn flakes, fruit yogurt, juice, bottled water, coffee. We had three breakfasts & didn't eat the same thing twice.
reviews.title: Lovely place to stay

reviews.text: Our nephew came to stay with us in Zurich and we found Emma house to be the perfect place. The all suites arrangement made it possible to have one room for the three of us with sufficient privacy and we were able to avoid two separate rooms.
reviews.title: Great Place for Families

likes.liked: — Large rooms, nice furniture, great breakfast

reviews.text: The suites are as pictured in the hotel web page well distributed, well furnished, with lots of light. The rooms are large, the bathrooms are also large and the breakfast brought to the room its excellent.
reviews.title: ema house wonderful

likes.disliked: — street noise if windows left open

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2007, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The reception staff is very welcoming and helpful.
reviews.title: Great quality at Emma House

likes.disliked: — Air conditioning controls not easy to locate or adjust.

reviews.text: The location, two tram stops from the train station is ideal. Its next to the Marriott hotel which is much more expensive.
reviews.title: Wonderful Stay at the Ema House

reviews.text: We stayed for 2 nights before going to Zermatt. It really is in the perfect location for anyone who would like to explore Zurich on foot. We are a family of 4 with two young children and felt comfortable and at home here.
reviews.title: Perfect Location

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed April 2009, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We had a wonderful experience staying for the weekend on a promotional rate. Excellent value for a fantastic suite. From the really helpful staff to the wonderful breakfast to the clean and well presented rooms there was nothing which we could fault.
reviews.title: A home away from home

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed December 2008, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Billed as home from home, the space and facilities offered, eg videos English television stations etc provided just that. In a very expensive city with the pound so low, cooking facilities helped reduce the costs.
reviews.title: Home from Home

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2008, traveled as a couple
reviews.title: Terrific Place in Zurich

likes.liked: — Extra large room with separate sleeping area

reviews.text: Just got back from a Swiss vacation and stayed at the Ema House as our first stop.
reviews.title: Loved EMA House

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed October 2009, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Really a good choice, but you need to close the shutters completely and get a fan to block out the noise. That's what we learned the hard way after a horrible first night. There were so many sirens, motorcycles, trucks, etc. that I actually took my pillow and blanket and slept (or tried to) in the bathtub for three hours. It was the only completely quite place in the whole suite. We had a room on what they call the second floor, which, because of the way the hotel sits on a hill, is actually below the lobby level, with no view - so ask for a room on a high floor. Aside from these problems, we still enjoyed the Ema house. The only hotel we visited that had more than one English TV channel (CNN). Believe me after hearing the same stories over and over again on CNN it's really a treat to be able to watch something entertaining. The EMA house also provides free movies in English - another nice treat. The breakfast was delicious and of very high quality. I'm pretty particular about coffee and it was very good. We asked how much it would cost to get an egg with breakfast and they told us $7 for one egg. Needless to say, we went eggless. he refrigerator and microwave were appreciated. We got two free 24 hrs. tram passes each day. Great for visiting all parts of city. We went to the lake, which was beautiful as well as the zoo which we really enjoyed and would recommend. All in all a fun stay in a beautiful city.
reviews.title: Be Aware - Ambulance Dispatch Around Back!!!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2009, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: My wife and I spent one night at the EMA House. The good points : perfect location, size of the room for the price, clean and confortable, nice welcome, good breakfast. The bad ones: no charm at all !!
reviews.title: Nice Surprise

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed August 2009, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: But let's be honest.... the ones with charm were charging at least 50% more than this one and we had a 40m2 room (it is an appart hotel) which you won't find in any hotels at this rate. I will return for sure.
reviews.title: Business like, but a great fine

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed August 2009, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Not your usual "hotel". More like an apartment complex. Lobby is quiet and rooms are updated. Very close to anything you'd want to walk to. The train stops RIGHT in front of the hotel. Perfect location and great value.
reviews.title: Top-Rated Hotel

reviews.text: Hotel located within walking distance of Old Town. Accomodations are private apartment. Incredible security. No breakfast buffet but room service (part of your room rate) is brought to you. Cannot emphasize how top-rate this hotel is and recommend highly!!
reviews.title: Beautiful rooms, thoughtful staff

aka: Ema House - The Zurich All Hotel
